amendment.description: To limit the amount of deferred foreign income that can be repatriated at a lower rate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3117 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 31 - 68. Record Vote Number: 81.

action.text: Amendment SA 3117 proposed by Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S4861-4868, S4883-4885; text: CR S4861) To limit the amount of deferred foreign income that can be repatriated at a lower rate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3117 proposed by Senator Breaux.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3117 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 31 - 68. Record Vote Number: 81.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3117 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 31 - 68. Record Vote Number: 81.
